Specializations of {{tt|submdspan_mapping_result}} are result types returned by overloads of {{tt|submdspan_mapping}}.

This class template has no base classes or declared members other than those shown below.

===Template parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|LayoutMapping|a layout mapping type that meets the requirements of {{named req|LayoutMapping}}}}
{{par end}}

===Data members===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem|Member name|Definition}}
{{dsc mem obj|mapping|nolink=true|calculated mapping of type {{tt|LayoutMapping}}. It is declared with {{attr|no_unique_address}} attribute.}}
{{dsc mem obj|offset|nolink=true|calculated offset of type {{lc|std::size_t}}.}}
{{dsc end}}

All these members have default member initializers where each data member is value initialized.
